home_seo_heading: EPUB Online Viewer – Read Ebooks in Your Browser
home_seo_intro: EPUB Online Viewer lets you read EPUB ebooks directly in your browser. Upload your .epub file, and start reading in seconds. No sign-up, no server storage—your library lives only on your device. Perfect for students, book lovers, and anyone who wants a simple, private way to read ebooks online.
home_seo_feature_upload: Upload EPUB files and store them in your browser (IndexedDB). Your books never leave your device.
home_seo_feature_reader: Full-screen reader with chapter navigation, table of contents, and optional two-page spread. Resume where you left off.
home_seo_feature_privacy: No account required. No server-side book storage. Your reading stays private.
home_seo_feature_i18n: Interface available in many languages. Switch language in the header.
home_seo_feature_theme: Light and dark theme. Choose what suits you.
home_seo_app_body: EPUB Online Viewer is a free web app for reading EPUB ebooks in the browser. It works on desktop and mobile, supports standard EPUB 2 and EPUB 3 files, and keeps your library locally so you stay in control of your data. Use it to read ebooks without installing software or creating an account. Start by uploading an EPUB above or open a book from your library to continue reading.
